Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the regulation of lobbying, and to repeal section 3-214 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the monthly docket of statements of registration required to be compiled by the city clerk.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Monthly docket of statements of registration required to be compiled by the city clerk.
